text:
@DrDenaGrayson "12 U.S. patients with Covid-19, only three of whom were treated with remdesivir, which was developed to treat the Ebola virus but shelved after proving less effective than other drugs during testing." Side effects rectal bleeding, elevated liver enzymes.
https://t.co/XV84GpQVr9
